citethispage-desc: Diar komt en nei [[Special:CiteThisPage|spezial-sidj]] tu, am sitiarin ianfacher tu maagin, an uk en ferwisang bi a werktjüügen
tooltip-citethispage: Hü detdiar sidj sitiaret wurd koon
citethispage-badrevision: Diar as wat skiaf gingen. För det sidj "$1" as nian werjuun mä det käänang "$2" fünjen wurden.
citethispage-content:
__NOTOC__
== Bibliograafisk dooten för {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Sidjentiitel: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Skriiwer(n): {{SITENAME}}-Bewerker * Ütjden faan: ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. * Leetst tooch bewerket: {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Ufrepen di: {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Permanent URL: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * Werjuunskäänang: {{REVISIONID}}
== Sitaatmuudin för {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [[APA style|APA-muude]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. Ufrepen di {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} faan {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[The MLA style manual|MLA-muude]] === "{{FULLPAGENAME}}." ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[MHRA Style Guide|MHRA-muude]] === {{SITENAME}}-Bewerker, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [ufrepen di {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[The Chicago Manual of Style|Chicago-muude]] === {{SITENAME}}-Bewerker, "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (ufrepen di {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[Council of Science Editors|CBE/CSE-muude]] === {{SITENAME}}-Bewerker. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Internet]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [sitiaret di {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}]. Tu fun oner: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Bluebook|Bluebook-muude]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (ufrepen di {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[BibTeX]]-Iindrach === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[Online; ufrepen di {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } Wan det [[LaTeX]]-moduul „url“ (\usepackage{url}) brükt woort, am det Internetadres smoker ütjtudun, koon detdiar ütjgoow nimen wurd: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[Online; ufrepen di {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
